text: And David arose, and went with all the people that were with him from Baale of Judah, to bring up from thence the ark of God, whose name is called by the name of the LORD of hosts that dwelleth between the cherubims.6.2 Baale: or, Baalah, that is, Kirjath-jearim6.2 whose nameâ€¦: or, at which the name, even the name of the LORD of hosts, was called upon
